Event.info: OSINT -  US CERT TA17-293A report - renamed PsExec execution (sigma/SIEM ruleset)

Attribute.comment: Detects renamed SysInternals tool execution with a binary named ps.exe as used by Dragonfly APT group and documentied in TA17-293A report
Attribute.value:
title: Ps.exe Renamed SysInternals Tool
description: Detects renamed SysInternals tool execution with a binary named ps.exe as used by Dragonfly APT group and documentied in TA17-293A report
reference: https://www.us-cert.gov/ncas/alerts/TA17-293A
author: Florian Roth
date: 2017/10/22
logsource:
    product: windows
    service: sysmon
detection:
    selection:
        EventID: 1
        CommandLine: 'ps.exe -accepteula'
    condition: selection
falsepositives:
    - Renamed SysInternals tool
level: high
